topic: What would you like to see changed, added or removed in the Tax laws amendment bill?
description:
Parliament is proposing to amend the Tax procedures Act - A summary of the bill can be accessed here https://t.ly/summaryTax2024. You can also access the full bill here https://t.ly/FullTaxBill2024. Please read 10 proposals from other Kenyans and vote whether you agree or disagree with each of them. You will see more proposals but you don't have to read and vote on all. 10 are enough. You can also submit your own proposal and it shall be presented to other Kenyans for their thoughts.

The zKe Campaign aims to submit the people's proposals to the relevant government ministry for consideration.
